title: Emergency Spot Injection
description: A fast-acting steroid and anti-inflammatory micro-injection that shrinks angry breakouts before events, shoots, or big meetings.
longDescription: A cystic breakout doesn’t have to hijack your plans. Our emergency spot injection delivers a tiny dose of diluted corticosteroid directly into the blemish, rapidly deflating swelling, redness, and pain. Ideal for hormonal cysts, maskne flare-ups, or pre-event emergencies.

overview.title: How the Rescue Works
overview.content: We cleanse the area, inject a micro-drop of diluted kenalog (or alternative anti-inflammatory) into the lesion, and apply LED or soothing mask. Swelling collapses within hours, redness fades, and makeup sits smoothly the next day.
